messages.messageBody:
rats! I bet you are already gone, didn't see your post til today. Anyway,
here is a great site, gives you everything.
I am so jealous! we were in the burg for two weeks at Christmas, I Love it
there. The Lee Green show is wonderful. Have fun
Teresa
<A HREF="http://the-mid-west-web.com/smbba.htm">Smoky Mountains Premier Page
- Gatlinburg - P...</A> if the link doesn't work, here is the url
http://the-mid-west-web.com/smbba.htm

messages.subject: Re: Gatlinburg weather
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Try http://www.intellicast.com they have pretty good weather forcasting information. Just click on the area where you want the forcast for, and keep
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
Try
http://www.intellicast.com
they have pretty good weather forcasting information. Just click on the
area where you want the forcast for, and keep clicking until you get
down to the local level. You can also see current radar and satellite
imagery there as well as a LOT more information. It could be a great
learning tool as well.
Have fun,
Kevin M. Avery

messages.subject: Gatlinburg weather
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, We are heading to Gatlinburg for the weekend to meet some of my dh s family. Does anyone know a site where I can check the forecast for there. There
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
We are heading to Gatlinburg for the weekend to meet some of my dh's
family.
Does anyone know a site where I can check the forecast for there.
There will be 8 children, and 6 adults in a 2 bedroom (one loft) cabin.
I want to be prepared with crafts if it looks like rain all weekend!
Thanks,
Ann
ps...anyone near there and have ideas of fun things. I'm sure we will
do cades cove. That's my favorite.

messages.subject: Re: Gatlinburg weather
messages.msgSnippet: www.weather.com then punch in the zip code (or city) and it will give you the forecast. Have fun! Stephanie
messages.messageBody:
www.weather.com
then punch in the zip code (or city) and it will give you the forecast. Have
fun!
Stephanie
